text: Nivin Pauly (born 10 October 1984) is an Indian movie actor. He mostly acts in Malayalam movies. His first movie was Malarvadi Arts Club. Some of his other movies are Thattathin Marayathu, Da Thadiya, Neram, 1983, Om Shanti Oshaana, Bangalore Days and Premam. ==Other websites== * * Category:Indian movie actors Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Indian Christians
title: Nivin Pauly
